mapper.sql: user_id, latitude, longitude, sex, img_url, `group`, birthday, native_place, docking_enterprise_total, merchants_value, success_business_num, message_time, channel_time, job, `location`, region
mapper.insert: insert into inv_user_detail (user_id, latitude, longitude, sex, img_url, `group`, birthday, native_place, docking_enterprise_total, merchants_value, success_business_num, message_time, channel_time, job, `location`, region ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dockingEnterpriseTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantsValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successBusinessNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{channelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{job,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

user_id,

mapper.update:
update inv_user_detail
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`group` = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
docking_enterprise_total = #{dockingEnterpriseTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merchants_value = #{merchantsValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
success_business_num = #{successBusinessNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
message_time = #{messageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
channel_time = #{channelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
job = #{job,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`location` = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update inv_user_detail set latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `group` = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, docking_enterprise_total = #{dockingEnterpriseTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merchants_value = #{merchantsValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, success_business_num = #{successBusinessNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, message_time = #{messageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, channel_time = #{channelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, job = #{job,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `location` = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT iud.user_id staffId, idu.name staffName, idu.department_id departId, idr.role_name staffRole, idu.mobile mobile, iud.job staffJob, iud.group staffGroup, iud.location stationLocation, iud.latitude stationLatitude, iud.longitude stationLongitude, iud.img_url staffImgUrl, iud.region region FROM inv_user_detail iud LEFT JOIN inv_ding_user idu ON iud.user_id = idu.id LEFT JOIN inv_ding_role idr ON idr.depart_id = idu.department_id WHERE iud.user_id = #{staffId}
